title: DevSets
description: Social media app for web developers to share images of users remote workspace.
tech: React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Firebase, API, Bootstrap, Canva, Axios
date: Role: UI/UX - Login Page, Logo Design, Google Authentication, Firebase Configuration

title: DND Character Creator Express
description: Application to automatically generate and save first-level Dungeons and Dragons characters.
tech: Postgres, Express, Node.js, Axios, Bcrypt, JavaScript Client-sessions, deployed with Heroku, MVC file structure
date: Role: Front-End Lead - UI/UX Login and Landing Page

title: Surprise Me-al
description: App that allows users to input a desired country/region and will be given a random meal from that region. User can save meals in favorites for future reference
tech: HTML, CSS, API, jQuery, Bootstrap, theMealDB, the cocktailDB
date: Role: Front-End Animations - Fetch API for Beverage Section

title: Employee Directory
description: An app built with React that allows users to quickly access their employee contact information.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness app that allows users to create, view and track daily workouts. The user is able to log multiple exercises in a given day and also go back and update the workout. The user may track the name, type, weight, sets, reps and duration of each exercise. Cardiovascular exercises show the distance traveled in miles.

title: Note Taker
description: Application to write, save, and delete notes with an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file. Organize, update, delete notes when needed.

title: Daily Planner
description: A calendar application that allows users to save events for each hour of the day.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Moment.js, localStorage
